title: What's next after I select Return to Course?
excerpt: When you select Return to Course, the Pearson REVEL Confirmation page in
content:
When you select Return to Course, the Pearson REVEL Confirmation page in Blackboard appears for you to choose the folder location of the REVEL link. You can then access the REVEL content and tools from your Blackboard course.

If you don't select Return to Course, the next time you access REVEL, the Pearson REVELÂ Confirmation page appears before your content.
